column17: The incident occurred on Saffon street in the Charlestown area.
column18: 06/04/2016: Assailants threw a grenade at the vehicle of Glenn Lall, a Kaieteur News publisher, in Georgetown, East Berbice-Corentyne, Guyana. There were no reported casualties as the device failed to detonate. No group claimed responsibility for the incident.
column97: A fragmentation grenade was used in the attack.
